languages.text: "Простите за наглость, шерин, однако нам так и не удалось обсудить астропатическое сообщение, что я получила с Футфола. Так вот, мои болваны попали в руки к неким ашмагам- конкурентам. Владайму сейчас не до интрижек, ему сама Инцендия Чорда хвост поприжала. А значит это дело рук Фалько, ажи бы его пожрали! Требует с меня Меркатум Табула Официале взамен на жизни ребят, ну что за трусливый выродок {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Простите за наглость, шерин, однако нам так и не удалось обсудить астропатическое сообщение, что я получила с Футфола. Так вот, мои болваны попали в руки к неким ашмагам- конкурентам. Владайму сейчас не до интрижек, ему сама Инцендия Чорда хвост поприжала. А значит это дело рук Фалько, ажи бы его пожрали! Требует с меня Меркатум Табула Официале взамен на жизни ребят, ну что за трусливый выродок {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g}!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"
languages.original_text: "Простите за наглость, шерин, однако нам так и не удалось обсудить астропатическое сообщение, что я получила с Футфола. Так вот, мои болваны попали в руки к неким ашмагам- конкурентам. Владайму сейчас не до интрижек, ему сама Инцендия Чорда хвост поприжала. А значит это дело рук Фалько, ажи бы его пожрали! Требует с меня Меркатум Табула Официале взамен на жизни ребят, ну что за трусливый выродок {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Forgive the audacity, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the astropathic message I had received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too busy to scheme with Incendia Chorda herself chewing him up, which means Falco is to blame, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez ma brusquerie, shereen, mais nous n'avons pas encore parlé du message astropathique que j'ai reçu en provenance de Castel. Il semblerait que ma bande de pieds-plats se soit fait capturer par des ashmags d'une faction rivale. Vladaym est trop occupé pour ce genre d'entourloupes, d'autant qu'Incendia Chorda l'a déjà remis à sa place, ce qui ne laisse qu'une seule possibilité : Falco, que les azhi lui dévorent le cœur ! Et vous savez ce qu'il exige en échange de mon équipage, ce fils de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} galeux ? La Mercatum Tabula Officiale, rien que ça ! »
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez ma brusquerie, shereen, mais nous n'avons pas encore parlé du message astropathique que j'ai reçu en provenance de Castel. Il semblerait que ma bande de pieds-plats se soit fait capturer par des ashmags d'une faction rivale. Vladaym est trop occupé pour ce genre d'entourloupes, d'autant qu'Incendia Chorda l'a déjà remis à sa place, ce qui ne laisse qu'une seule possibilité : Falco, que les azhi lui dévorent le cœur ! Et vous savez ce qu'il exige en échange de mon équipage, ce fils de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} galeux ? La Mercatum Tabula Officiale, rien que ça ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “请原谅我的鲁莽，亲爱的，咱们还没讨论过我从落脚港收到的星语者信息呢。看起来，我那群白痴手下被一群坏种抓走了。弗拉迪姆此刻忙得不可开交，更别提因森蒂娅·库尔达已经把他安排得明明白白了。现在只剩下法尔科了，愿鬼怪吞了他的心！那个不要脸的孬种，{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}生出来的杂种，他打算夺走我的帝国官方行商执照，否则就要了我那些船员的命！”
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我的鲁莽，亲爱的，咱们还没讨论过我从落脚港收到的星语者信息呢。看起来，我那群白痴手下被一群坏家伙抓走了。弗拉迪姆此刻忙得不可开交，更别提因森蒂娅·库尔达已经把他安排得明明白白了。现在只剩下法尔科了，愿鬼怪吞了他的心！那个不要脸的孬种，{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}生出来的杂种，他打算夺走我的帝国官方行商执照，否则就要了我那些船员的命！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Verzeiht meine Forschheit, Shereen, doch wir haben noch nicht über die astropathische Nachricht gesprochen, die ich von Footfall erhalten habe. Offenbar hat sich meine idiotische Crew von rivalisierenden Ashmags schnappen lassen. Vladaym ist zu beschäftigt für Intrigen, und zudem hat Incendia Chorda ihn schon zurechtgestutzt. Also bleibt nur Falco, möge der Azhi sein Herz verschlingen! Dieser feige Sohn eines räudigen {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g} verlangt im Tausch für die Leben meiner Crew die Mercatum Tabula Officiale!"
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht meine Forschheit, Shereen, doch wir haben noch nicht über die astrophathische Nachricht gesprochen, die ich von Footfall erhalten habe. Offenbar hat sich meine idiotische Crew von rivalisierenden Ashmags schnappen lassen. Vladaym ist zu beschäftigt für Intrigen, und zudem hat Incendia Chorda ihn schon zurechtgestutzt. Also bleibt nur Falco, möge der Azhi sein Herz verschlingen! Dieser feige Sohn eines räudigen{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g} verlangt im Tausch für die Leben meiner Crew die Mercatum Tabula Officiale!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Disculpe la urgencia, shereen, pero todavía no hemos hablado del mensaje Astropático que me ha llegado de Paso. Por lo visto, ciertos ashmags rivales han capturado a los zoquetes de mis súbditos. Vladaym está demasiado ocupado para estos asuntos, además de que Incendia Chorda ya lo ha puesto en su sitio, con lo que solo nos queda Falco. ¡Mal rayo le parta! Ese cobarde hijo de un sucio {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} está exigiendo una Mercatum Tabula Officiale a cambio de las vidas de mis tripulantes».
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe la urgencia, shereen, pero todavía no hemos hablado del mensaje Astropático que me ha llegado de Paso. Por lo visto, ciertos ashmags rivales han capturado a los zoquetes de mis súbditos. Vladaym está demasiado ocupado para estos asuntos, además de que Incendia Chorda ya lo ha puesto en su sitio, con lo que solo nos queda Falco. ¡Mal rayo le parta! Ese cobarde hijo de un sucio {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} está exigiendo una Mercatum Tabula Officiale a cambio de las vidas de mis tripulantes».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「お行儀が悪くてごめんね、シャリーン。でもあたしがフットフォールから受け取った感応通信官のメッセージの話がまだなんだ。ウチのバカ達がどっかに消えて、ライバルのアッシュマグ共に捕まったようでね。ヴラダイムは悪巧みで忙しいし、なによりインセンディア・チョーダがすでに奴を押さえつけている。ということは、残るのはファルコしかいないから、奴めアジーに心臓を飲まれたらいいのさ！不潔な{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}の臆病者め、ウチのクルーの命と引き換えに、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを要求しやがった！」
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"

traits.locale_text: 「お行儀が悪くてごめんね、シャリーン。でもあたしがフットフォールから受け取った感応通信官のメッセージの話がまだなんだ。ウチのバカ達がどっかに消えて、ライバルのアッシュマグ共に捕まったようでね。ヴラダイムは悪巧みで忙しいし、なによりインセンディア・チョーダがすでに奴を押さえつけている。ということは、残るのはファルコしかいないから、奴めアジーに心臓を飲まれたらいいのさ！不潔な{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}の臆病者め、ウチのクルーの命と引き換えに、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを要求しやがった！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim, ihtiyatsızlığımı bağışla lütfen. Fakat Binliman'dan gelen Astropatik mesajı henüz konuşmuş değiliz. Benim dangalaklardan biri, gidip hasım külboğazların eline düşmüş. Vladaym meşgulmüş. Ayrıca İncendia Chorda'dan bir ağız dolusu azar işitmiş zaten. Geriye bir tek Falco kalıyor, onun da canını azhiler alsın! Ödlek {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} dölü, tayfamdakilerin canı karşılığında Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi istiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Forgive my rashness, shereen, but we have not yet discussed the Astropathic message I received from Footfall. It looks like my numbskulls had gone and got themselves captured by some rival ashmags. Vladaym is too occupied for schemes, and besides Incendia Chorda has already put him in his place, which leaves only Falco, may the azhi swallow his heart! That cowardly son of a mangy {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} is demanding Mercatum Tabula Officiale in exchange for the lives of my crew!"
